titleStmt.title: Mr. Grymstons speech in Parliament upon the accusation and impeachment of William Laud Arch-bishop of Canterbury upon high treason declaring his wicked proceedings and ex-orbitant power, both in church and common-wealth.
Speech in Parliament upon the accusation and impeachment of William Laud
titleStmt.author: Grimston, Harbottle, Sir, 1603-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
